name: Toril
description: Toril is a warm and loving woman from Stange, close to Hamar. She studied in Hamar and today she is a secondary school teacher in Elverum.

name: Øyvind
description: Øyvind is a technology interested man from Hamar. He studied and started working with IT in Oslo. He moved back to Hamar when he met Toril. They now live together.

name: Melis
description: Melis is the family's cuddle machine. She's originally from Kongsvinger and currently enjoys life in Hamar with her family.
